简单地问一下有哪些备份加还原的软件？

open-goal /

      jak-project---Reviving the language that brought us the Jak & Daxter Series

ToolJet /

      ToolJet---Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder. Built using JavaScript/TypeScript. 🚀

spacedriveapp /

      spacedrive---Spacedrive is an open source cross-platform file explorer, powered by a virtual distributed filesystem written in Rust.

free-audio /

      clap---Audio Plugin API

adiwajshing /

      Baileys---Lightweight full-featured WhatsApp Web + Multi-Device API

rustdesk /

      rustdesk---Open source virtual / remote desktop infrastructure for everyone! The open source TeamViewer alternative. Display and control your PC and Android devices.

midoks /

      mdserver-web---Simple Linux Panel

Grasscutters /

      Grasscutter---A server software reimplementation for a certain anime game.

tauri-apps /

      tauri---Build smaller, faster, and more secure desktop applications with a web frontend.

codecrafters-io /

      build-your-own-x---Master programming by recreating your favorite technologies from scratch.

lucacasonato /

      fresh---Preact, but super edgy

n3r4zzurr0 /

      svg-spinners---A collection of 24 x 24 dp SVG spinners!

alibaba /

      IOC-golang---一款服务于 Go 开发者的依赖注入框架，方便搭建任何 Go 应用。 A Golang depenedency injection framework, helps developers to build any go application.

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

Tencent /

      spring-cloud-tencent---Spring Cloud Tencent is a Spring Boot based Service Governance Framework provided by Tencent, including service discovery, traffic control, circuitbreak, ratelimit, config and so on.

Minqi824 /

      ADBench---Official Implement of "ADBench: Anomaly Detection Benchmark".

sogou /

      workflow---C++ Parallel Computing and Asynchronous Networking Engine

microsoft /

      BotBuilder-Samples---Welcome to the Bot Framework samples repository. Here you will find task-focused samples in C#, JavaScript and TypeScript to help you get started with the Bot Framework SDK!

GitHubDaily /

      GitHubDaily---坚持分享 GitHub 上高质量、有趣实用的开源技术教程、开发者工具、编程网站、技术资讯。A list cool, interesting projects of GitHub.

stephencelis /

      SQLite.swift---A type-safe, Swift-language layer over SQLite3.

runelite /

      runelite---Open source Old School RuneScape client

csteinmetz1 /

      ai-audio-startups---Community list of startups working with AI in audio and music technology

elastic /

      eui---Elastic UI Framework 🙌

tauri-apps /

      tao---The TAO of cross-platform windowing. A library in Rust built for Tauri.

Asabeneh /

      30-Days-Of-JavaScript---30 days of JavaScript programming challenge is a step-by-step guide to learn JavaScript programming language in 30 days. This challenge may take more than 100 days, please just follow your own pace.
